title: Leather, ca. 1750
creditline: Museum purchase through gift in memory of Josephine C. Howell and through bequest of Edith M. Henderson and from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Fund
description: Diaper or trellis pattern, enclosing floral bouquets. The trellis pattern is composed of strapwork and scrolling foliage in the Rococo style.

tombstone.epitaph:
Leather, ca. 1750.
ca. 1750. Leather, embossed, painted, gilded. Museum purchase through gift in memory of Josephine C. Howell and through bequest of Edith M. Henderson and from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Fund. 1989-34-1.
